name: Hover-Pixel 384
description:
Hover your pixel through procedurally generated mazes! Use the arrow keys. The demo on this page will let you play through 3/4 of one maze. After you've finished it, download the game for thousands of mazes and more difficulty options. Finishing the game once usually takes between 10 and 40 minutes; the maze generator will keep delivering fresh challenges for many hours.

The recommended download version of the game is packaged as an offline HTML file that you can play in an up-to-date Web browser on any desktop OS, including Mac. The larger alternate downloads are provided just in case of compatibility problems or performance problems.

Comments are open, but please avoid spoiling unlockables and the deepest 1/8 of the full game.

Streamers: you have permission to stream this game, including the music. If you stream the music separately from the game, please credit the game.
